data.title: Millard Douglas JACKSON Obituary 2021
data.meta_description: Millard Douglas "Doug" JACKSON, 64, of Richburg, NY, died Friday, November 12, 2021 in Highland Hospital, Rochester.                Born October 10, 1957, he was the son of Mill...
data.meta_site_name: Olney Foust Funeral Homes and Crematory
data.text:
Millard Douglas “Doug” JACKSON, 64, of Richburg, NY, died Friday, November 12, 2021 in Highland Hospital, Rochester.

Born October 10, 1957, he was the son of Millard D. and Viva A. Cooper Jackson. On August 6, 1983, in Friendship, he married the former Gayle Green, who survives. A graduate of Friendship High School, he was employed by CA BOCES in Belmont in the janitorial department for 21 years. Doug was a member of Friendship Bible Baptist Church.

Surviving besides his wife, Gayle, are: five children; Christopher Douglas Jackson, Corrie Lynn (Kyle) Ahrens, Todd Jason Jackson, Jessica Evelyn Marie (Cody) Myers, and Daniel Floyd Jackson; 10 grandchildren; five great-grandchildren; aunts, uncles, and cousins. In addition to his parents, he was predeceased by a brother, Roger D Jackson, on April 30, 2016.

Friends may call at Friendship Bible Baptist Church on Friday, November 19, 2021 from 10:00 AM – 12:00 PM, with Funeral Services following at 12:00 PM. Rev. Duane Broadwell will officiate. Burial will be in Mount View Cemetery, Olean.

Memorials may be made to Friendship Bible Baptist Church, 43 W. Main St., Friendship, NY 14739.
